Command *admincmds_listeners*
******************************

Documentation for the admincmds_listeners command in */trans/admincmds/listeners.c*.

Command
=======

USAGE: 

   |  ``listeners``
   |  ``listeners <channel name>``

Displays list of people listening to channels
Admin only
